facts: 1. Cats have a flexible spine and can rotate their ears 180 degrees.
2. Cats have a specialized collar bone (clavicle) that allows them to always land on their feet when they fall.
3. Cats have a grooming reflex that kicks in when they're stressed, which is why they may groom themselves excessively during times of anxiety.
4. A cat's brain is more similar to a human brain than a dog's brain.

7. Cats can make over 100 different sounds, while dogs can only make about 10.
8. In ancient Egypt, killing a cat was a crime punishable by death.

10. Cats can run up to 30 miles per hour, but they're more likely to be found lounging around the house.
